item.title: 3 Steps, Zero Cost: 2000 tokens/s Coding Backend for Claude Code (Cerebras × Cloudflare)
item.description: Deploy an OpenAI-compatible gateway with Cloudflare Workers + run.claw.cloud + free Cerebras credits. Connect Claude Code to a blazing-fast backend at near-zero cost, with setup commands, gateway config, and troubleshooting tips.
